patthana16.64:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.64:2.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.64:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana16.64:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ oghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana16.64:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ yogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.64:6.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.64:7.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.64:8.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.64:9.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana16.64:10.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
